githubURL.title: GitHub Service Class name
githubURL.description: The name of the GitHub Connector Service Class. Find it in Service Catalog > Services. It consist of "github-" and your repository or organization name

workspaceName.title: Slack Service Class name
workspaceName.description: The name of the Slack Connector Service Class. Find it in Service Catalog > Services. It consist of "slack-connector-" and your Slack channel name

channelName.title: Slack channel name
channelName.description: The name of the slack channel where notifications will be sent to.
